description: New research from the DESI project suggests that dark energy, once thought to be a constant force, may actually be changing over time. This challenges long-held cosmological models that assume a stable influence of dark energy on the universe’s expansion. By mapping 15 million galaxies, DESI’s data raises new questions about cosmic evolution. Scientists are now re-evaluating whether the standard model can still fully explain the universe’s rapid expansion. Further research is expected to provide a clearer understanding of dark energy’s true role in shaping the cosmos.
title: New Research Suggests Dark Energy Is Evolving, Challenging Cosmology Models

description: Fossilized feathers of a 30,000-year-old vulture, found in volcanic ash near Rome, have been analyzed, revealing a unique preservation process. Unlike typical fossilized feathers, these retained three-dimensional structures, likely due to zeolite minerals formed in the ash. Scientists believe the vulture was buried in a low-temperature pyroclastic deposit, allowing soft tissues to fossilize at a microscopic level. This breakthrough suggests volcanic rocks could hold more fossils than previously thought.
title: 30,000-Year-Old Vulture Feathers Discovered, Uniquely Preserved in Volcanic Ash

description: New research explores the possibility of alien life on planets orbiting white dwarfs. While these stellar remnants cool over time, their shrinking habitable zones may still allow biological processes like photosynthesis and UV-driven abiogenesis to occur. A model assessing a planet's energy reception over seven billion years indicates that life-sustaining conditions could persist. These findings suggest white dwarf systems should be reconsidered in the search for extraterrestrial life, potentially guiding future observations with the James Webb Space Telescope.
title: Alien Life May Survive on Planets Orbiting White Dwarfs, Study Finds

description: Anora, the Palme d’Or-winning film directed by Sean Baker, is now streaming on JioHotstar. Starring Mikey Madison, the film follows a young stripper who impulsively marries a Russian oligarch’s son, triggering a battle against his powerful family. With critical acclaim, multiple awards, and strong performances, Anora is a must-watch. Now available on JioHotstar.
title: Anora Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: ESA’s Euclid telescope has released its first dataset, mapping 26 million galaxies within a week. The observations include deep-field images, a survey of 380,000 galaxies, and 500 new gravitational lens candidates. Scientists will continue tracking cosmic evolution over six years. The dataset, currently 35 terabytes, is expected to grow to 2 petabytes. These findings offer key insights into dark matter, dark energy, and the universe’s large-scale structure.
title: ESA’s Euclid Telescope Releases First Data, Mapping 26 Million Galaxies

description: Google X has unveiled the Taara chip, a silicon photonics device that transmits high-speed internet via light beams. Unlike traditional fiber-optic cables, which require extensive underground installation, this technology provides a cost-effective and scalable alternative. Field tests demonstrated speeds of 10 Gbps over a one-kilometre distance. Designed to work in a mesh network, the Taara chip aims to improve internet accessibility in remote or challenging terrains. The chip is expected to be integrated into a commercial product by 2026.
title: Google X Introduces Taara Chip to Enable High-Speed Internet via Light Beams

description: NASA’s Hubble Space Telescope has captured a striking image of NGC 4536, a starburst galaxy 50 million light-years away in the Virgo constellation. The galaxy’s sweeping spiral arms are filled with young blue star clusters and ionized hydrogen gas, indicating rapid star formation. Astronomers believe its bar-like structure channels gas toward the core, fuelling intense stellar birth. Part of a broader study on galactic evolution, this image offers insights into the connection between young stars and interstellar gas.
title: Hubble Telescope Captures NGC 4536, a Starburst Galaxy with Intense Star Formation

description: ISRO and IIT Madras have launched the S Ramakrishnan Centre of Excellence for Research in Fluid and Thermal Sciences. The facility, inaugurated on 17 March 2025, will focus on spacecraft cooling, fluid dynamics, and cryogenic engine advancements. Housed in IIT Madras’ Department of Mechanical Engineering, it will facilitate collaboration between ISRO scientists and academic researchers. The partnership is expected to enhance India's capabilities in space technology, supporting future deep-space missions and reusable spacecraft development. A seminar hall honouring Arcot Ramachandran was also inaugurated.
title: ISRO and IIT Madras Unveil Research Centre for Space Thermal Sciences

description: Boeing’s Starliner spacecraft remains under evaluation following its troubled Crew Flight Test mission. NASA is investigating propulsion issues, including helium leaks and overheating thrusters, with testing set to take place at White Sands. Whether the next flight will carry astronauts is still undecided. NASA aims to certify Starliner for long-duration missions, but the timeline remains uncertain. The importance of having multiple crewed transport options is emphasised, ensuring redundancy for future low Earth orbit missions.
title: NASA Reviews Boeing Starliner’s Future Amid Technical Challenges

description: UK-based Pulsar Fusion has revealed plans for Sunbird, a nuclear fusion-powered rocket that could change space exploration. The company says this technology could reduce travel time to Mars and beyond by half. Sunbirds will act as space tugs, attaching to spacecraft in orbit and propelling them further. Initial tests will be conducted in vacuum chambers, with an orbital demonstration expected by 2027. However, experts remain sceptical about the feasibility of achieving fusion propulsion in space. The company has not set a timeline for a full-scale prototype.
title: Pulsar Fusion’s Nuclear Fusion Rockets May Revolutionise Space Travel

description: Scientists have identified supernova debris in deep-sea sediments, including a rare plutonium isotope linked to a kilonova. Researchers believe a neutron star collision occurred nearly 10 million years ago, scattering radioactive material across space. To validate this theory, they plan to analyze lunar soil, which remains undisturbed by Earth's geological processes. With upcoming Artemis missions expected to return fresh moon samples, scientists hope to confirm the event’s existence and refine their understanding of stellar explosions.
title: Supernova Remnants Found in Oceanic Samples, Scientists Look to Moon

description: Bharti Airtel, along with Bharti Hexacom, has prepaid Rs. 5,985 billion to the government, clearing "high-cost" liabilities from the 2024 spectrum auctions. India's second-largest telecom firm has reduced its spectrum-related debt to Rs. 52,000 crore, lowering the cost of debt to 7.22%. Airtel has been actively prepaying dues from past aggressive spectrum bidding.
title: Bharti Airtel, Unit Pay Rs. 5,985 Crore to Clear 'High-Cost' 2024 Spectrum Dues

description: Character AI, the California-based artificial intelligence (AI) platform, introduced a new safety feature on Tuesday. Dubbed Parental Insights, the feature is aimed at the platform’s users under the age of 18. These users can add a parent or guardian’s email address, and the platform will send them a summary of their teen’s activity.
title: Character AI Introduces Parental Insights Feature, Provides Information About Teenagers’ In-App Activities

description: The CME group has announced its partnership with Google Cloud to explore blockchain services like asset tokenisation. Later this year, the companies will begin testing blockchain solutions for trading and tokenisation with market participants.
title: CME Group Using Google Cloud’s Blockchain for Next-Gen Derivatives Exchange Upgrades

description: iPhone 17 Air has been spotted in a leaked image, showing a 3D printed model alongside the purported iPhone 17 Pro. The iPhone 17 Air is said to be Apple's slimmest phone at 5.5mm with a single rear camera, while the Pro is expected to feature a triple-camera setup. Both models are anticipated to launch later this year.
title: iPhone 17 Air Thinness Compared With iPhone 17 Pro in Leaked Image

description: Maharashtra has dropped a 6 percent sales tax proposal on EVs priced above $35,000 (roughly Rs. 30 lakh) to boost adoption in India, where EV sales remain low at 2 percent of four million cars sold last year. Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis cited unnecessary disincentivisation, while the federal goal aims for 30 percent EV adoption by 2030.
title: Maharashtra Scraps Six Percent EV Tax Plan to Boost Adoption

description: Nothing has announced the second edition of its Community Edition Project. The UK brand will conduct the project in four stages, and participants can submit their ideas starting today. Nothing will take ideas about hardware design, accessory design, wallpaper design, and marketing campaign from the Nothing community to launch a special version of Nothing Phone 3a. The winners of each brief will have the chance to collaborate directly with the Nothing team to help bring their creations to life.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Community Edition Project Announced; Phone Said to Launch Later This Year

description: Realme GT 7, which had previously appeared on several certification and benchmarking websites, has now shown up in another new leak, which suggests that the handset may launch soon. The leak also hints at several key specifications of the phone. Meanwhile, another leak has suggested some important features of the alleged Realme GT 8 Pro. The company has yet to confirm the launch of either handsets.
title: Realme GT 7 Launch Timeline, Key Features Surface Online; Realme GT 8 Pro Specifications Tipped

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is expected to go official in April. The handset, which was teased at the Galaxy Unpacked event earlier this year, will debut as the fourth model in the Galaxy S25 series. As we wait for the formal reveal, a new hands-on video shows off leaked dummy units of the phone. The dummy units are shown in two colour options and showcase the thin design of the Galaxy S25 Edge.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Dummy Unit Leaked; Suggests Slim Build, Off-Centered USB Type-C Port

description: Alibaba’s Qwen team released another artificial intelligence (AI) model to the Qwen 2.5 family on Monday. Dubbed Qwen 2.5-VL-32B, the AI model comes with improved performance and optimisations. It is a vision language model with 32 billion parameters, and it joins the three billion, seven billion, and 72 billion parameter size models in the Qwen 2.5 family.
title: Alibaba Qwen 2.5 Vision Language Model Released in a Smaller Size, Packs Agentic Capabilities

description: Oppo Find X8s is set to be unveiled in China next month alongside the Oppo Find X8 Ultra and Find X8s+. Ahead of the April 10 launch, the company has confirmed the screen size of the Oppo Find X8s. Oppo posted several teasers that show various design elements of the upcoming smartphone, like its display, camera bump, profile, and a new button.
title: Oppo Find X8s Display Size, Design Features Teased Ahead of April 10 Launch

description: Apple is reportedly encountering hurdles in designing the next Apple Watch SE. The company is developing a refreshed model with a plastic body, but its design team disapproves of the look, as per Bloomberg's Mark Gurman. Efforts continue to reduce production costs, and the new smartwatch might be launched in September alongside the next iPhone generation.
title: Apple Reportedly Faces Challenges While Designing Watch SE With Plastic Body

description: Motorola is expected to unveil the Razr 60 Ultra, Edge 60, and Edge 60 Pro smartphones soon. Ahead of the official debut, these smartphones have allegedly appeared on an e-commerce website, hinting at their European pricing, RAM and storage configurations, and colour options.
title: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra, Edge 60 and Edge 60 Pro European Prices, RAM and Storage Variants Leaked

description: After a messy iOS 18 rollout, Apple is looking to keep its users hooked to the iPhone by launching a visually refreshing iOS update next year. Rumours are ripe and today we have yet another mockup based on someone’s experience with an actual working build of iOS 19, which is expected to be revealed at WWDC 25 in June.
title: Apple iOS 19 Leaked Mockups Suggest ‘Glassy’, VisionOS-Inspired Design

description: Google released the successor to its Gemini 2.0 series artificial intelligence (AI) models on Wednesday. Dubbed Gemini 2.5 Pro Experimental, it is the first model the company is releasing from the 2.5 family. The Mountain View-based tech giant says that this series of models will have “thinking” or reasoning capability built directly into the models.
title: Google’s Gemini 2.5 Pro AI Model Launched; Tops Leaderboard, Outperforms OpenAI’s o3 Mini

description: Oppo has been granted a patent in China for a foldable tablet featuring a book-style design with rounded corners. The patent reveals detailed views of the tablet from multiple angles. Likely intended for business or entertainment use, the device may include a single outer camera and a USB Type-C port on one folding panel.
title: Oppo's Book-Style Foldable Tablet Design Spotted in Patent Document

description: Vivo Y300t will be unveiled in China later this month alongside the Vivo Y300 Pro+. Prior to the launch, the company has revealed the design, colourways and key features of the upcoming handset. The Vivo Y300t appears to be similar to the Vivo T4x 5G, which was unveiled in India earlier this month. It is speculated to share similar specifications as well.
title: Vivo Y300t Confirmed to Get 6,500mAh Battery; to Launch Alongside Vivo Y300 Pro+ on March 31

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7 launch is still months away, but numerous leaks about their design are popping up on the Web. Most recently, a leak suggests the case designs for the flip-style foldable phone. The transparent protective cases look similar to the current Galaxy Z Flip 6. The Galaxy Z Flip 7 is expected to be slightly bigger than the Galaxy Z Flip 6, with a 6.85-inch internal display. The new leak also shows a screen protector for the Galaxy Z Fold 7, and it appears to be taller than the outgoing model.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Leaked Case Renders Suggest Design; Galaxy Z Fold 7 Protective Glass Surfaces Online

description: Sony WF-C710N TWS earphones were launched in select global markets on Tuesday as successors to the Sony WF-C700N TWS headsets. They are equipped with noise-cancelling features including Ambient Sound and Adaptive Sound Control. The WF-C710N are compatible with the Sound Connect app and are claimed to offer a total playback time of up to 30 hours with the charging case.
title: Sony WF-C710N TWS Earphones With ANC, Up to 30 Hours Total Battery Life Launched

description: Vivo T4 5G will launch in India soon. The exact launch date is still under wraps, but Vivo has started teasing the new T series smartphone through its India website. The Vivo T4 5G will be available for purchase through Flipkart. It will be equipped with a Snapdragon chipset and a hole-punch display design. The Vivo T4 5G will come with upgrades over Vivo T3 5G, which was unveiled in the country in March last year. It is expected to pack a 7,300mAh battery.
title: Vivo T4 5G Confirmed to Launch in India Soon; to Be Available on Flipkart

description: OpenAI is enhancing ChatGPT to simplify image editing and create visuals with legible text. At its latest event, it showcased features like refining images through conversations and generating detailed visuals such as menus or maps. ChatGPT will better handle complex user instructions, enabling the creation of diagrams, infographics, and professional designs.
title: ChatGPT Improves Photo Editing Feature, Lets Users Create Charts for Work

description: Nintendo Switch 2 is expected to boost active users to record levels, according to Goldman Sachs, driving Nintendo Co. shares to a seven-month high. Set for an April 2 unveiling, the console aims to "unlock dormant users." Launching over seven years after the original Switch, anticipation has pushed Nintendo’s stock to all-time highs.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Outlook by Goldman Sachs Drives Shares

description: Tecno Camon 40 series of smartphones was unveiled earlier this year during the Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2025 in Barcelona. The lineup consists of the Camon 40, 40 Pro, a Pro 5G, and a Premier 5G variant. The handsets run on Android 15 with HiOS 15 skin on top out-of-the-box. The company has now confirmed that the lineup will receive OS updates up to Android 18 and up to five years of security patches.
title: Tecno Camon 40 Series to Get OS Updates Up to Android 18, 5 Years of Security Patches

description: Donald Trump's World Liberty Financial will launch a dollar-pegged USD1 stablecoin. USD1 will be launched on the Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain blockchains - digital ledgers that underpin the movement of crypto coins.
title: Trump Family's World Liberty Financial Crypto Venture to Launch Stablecoin

description: Music publishers UMG, Concord and ABKCO sued Anthropic in 2023, alleging that it infringed their copyrights in lyrics from at least 500 songs. The publishers claimed Anthropic used the lyrics without permission to train Claude to respond to human prompts. Anthropic, for now, has convinced a California federal judge on Tuesday to reject a preliminary bid on the matter.
title: Anthropic Wins Early Round in Music Publishers' AI Copyright Case

description: The overall crypto market cap rose by 0.76 percent over the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether, both registered gains on Wednesday, March 26. Altcoins such as Dogecoin, Cardano, and Avalanche also registered gains. Leo and Uniswap, on the other hand, registered price drops.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Trades Close to $88,000, Majority Altcoins Register Gains

description: Nothing is rolling out an update to its AI-powered hub, Essential Space, featured in the newly launched Phone 3a and 3a Pro. The update introduces a Camera Capture feature that allows users to snap photos and extract key details using optical character recognition. Nothing says it plans to roll out more features for Essential Space in the coming months.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Series' Essential Space Hub Updated With Camera Capture Feature

description: Signal's president defended the app's security after US officials mistakenly added a journalist to an encrypted chatroom discussing US military action in Yemen. While not addressing the error, Meredith Whittaker called Signal the "gold standard in private comms" on X, highlighting its security benefits over WhatsApp amid claims of a national security breach by Democratic lawmakers.
title: Signal Head Defends Messaging App's Security After US War Plan Leak

description: Apple is all set to host its Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) in June, the Cupertino tech giant announced on Tuesday. The five-day affair will begin with a special event keynote on June 9, and it will spotlight the latest advancements in Apple software. The event will end on June 13 and will be accessible to all Apple developers with no associated costs.
title: Apple's WWDC 2025 Event Will Kick Off on June 9: Here's What to Expect

description: Vivo X200 Ultra is expected to join the Vivo X200 and X200 Pro variants in China soon. During the Boao Forum for Asia, where the company showcased its Vivo Vision mixed reality AR/VR headset, it also confirmed the launch timeline of the Vivo X200 Ultra. The handset has been teased to "integrate Vivo's latest advancements in imaging." It was bestowed with the title of the "Official Smartphone of Boao Forum for Asia."
title: Vivo X200 Ultra Confirmed to Launch in April; Could Arrive With Vivo X200s
